courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques

courses.description: Improve your vocal techniques and learn how to maintain your voice.

courses.description: Learn how to produce electronic music using various software and hardware.
